title: Ok just recieved my pixel 4xl. How do I go back or unselect something copied?
content:
Ok I'm setting up my phone and this has caused me alot of fustration.
How can I back out of window, rather than going to a different window? Also how do you unselect copied items?
To see what I mean, try moving folders and files around in a file manager. (I'm using solid explorer)
It's a crap shoot to what happens.
I'm not going back to the 3 buttons as I'm kinda use to navigation gestures.
Can someone from Google answer if gestures are going to be editable in the near future? If not I need to return this. 
What fool suggested to remove the back gesture? Even more what idiot agreed this is the future?
I'm saying that as a serious user. 
I was so excited, now only after 3 hours I wanna throw this phone at the wall, or just go back in time and use 3 buttons. What a terrible step backwards.
Please unlock gestures let us choose what is controlled, I have no use for assistant and now it's hard coded in 2 corners, one being the back gesture.
If Steve Jobs was still around he'd be marvelling in your screw up.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
